articles.title: FM Meets Special Assistant to Rev. Franklin Graham
articles.content:
FM Meets Special Assistant to Rev. Franklin Graham 
   Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun met and conversed with Melvin L. Cheatham, special assistant to Rev. Franklin Graham, religious leader of the U.S., and his party at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Thursday.
 On hand were officials concerned.

Namibian Prime Minister Supports Korean People
articles.content:
Namibian Prime Minister Supports Korean People 
   Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- I remember that the Korean people gave unsparing assistance to the Namibian people in their struggle for independence.
 Namibian Prime Minister Nahas Angula said this when he met with the DPRK ambassador who paid a farewell call on him on Aug. 8.    
 He stressed that the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung made a great contribution to the struggle of the Namibian people for independence and the building of a new society. He expressed full support to the Korean people in their struggle to achieve reunification by their own efforts.

articles.title: Anti-U.S., Anti-War Struggle Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Anti-U.S., Anti-War Struggle Called for in S. Korea 
   Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the National Alliance of Youth and Students for the Country's Reunification reportedly released an appeal titled "Believing in the strength of people ensures victory" on August 13.
 The U.S. has revealed its aggressive nature by staging frantic war exercises against the north and scheming to materialize the "strategic flexibility" of the U.S. troops in south Korea and conclude the south Korea-U.S. "Free Trade Agreement", the appeal said, stressing that peace in this land can be defended only when all the fellow countrymen are united under the banner of peace against the U.S. and war, banner of "By our nation itself".   
 The appeal called for strengthening the united might of the nation in every way and concentrating everything on the anti-U.S., anti-war struggle.

Congratulations to Venezuelan Foreign Minister
articles.content:
Congratulations to Venezuelan Foreign Minister
   Pyongyang, August 17 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun sent a congratulatory message to Nicolas Maduro Moros upon his appointment as foreign minister of the Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela.
 The message wished him success in his work, expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow strong in various fields as desired by the two peoples.
